articles.description: Koulibaly is said to have been receptive to Klopp's proposal over a potential switch to Anfield, while Newcastle are also interested in the Napoli defender
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp has reportedly made contact with Napoli defender Kalidou Koulibaly over a move to Anfield this summer. 
 The Liverpool boss is said to have called Koulibaly to outline his plans for the… [+1975 chars]
